title: Anyone else having login issues right now?

replies.body:
There were login issues earlier, but those issues have since been resolved. You can always check the status of the login service on the Service Status page:

http://status.leagueoflegends.com/?en_AU#oce
Yep, it seems both EUW and also NA have the same issue... Wonder what's going on
Yes unable to log in to.
